definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: official, officer (prop. scribe, secretary? or fr. original meaning as arranger, organizer?);—abs. ´[[שׁ]]: Pr 6:7, ´[[שׁו]]: 2Ch 26:11; pl. [[שׁׂטְרִים]] De 1:15 +, etc.;—appar. subordinate officer, judicial, civil or military (cf. Dr:De 1:15 Gray:Nu 11:16); organizing people for marching Jos 1:10 Jos 3:2 (both E), cf. De 20:5, De 20:8, De 20:9; appointed over Isr. by Egypt. overseers Ex 5:14, cf. v:Ex 5:6, v:Ex 5:10, v:Ex 5:15, v:Ex 5:19 (all J); elsewhere + [[זְקֵנִים]] Nu 11:16 (E), De 29:9, De 31:28; + [[שׁׂפְטִים]] De 16:18, 1Ch 23:4, 1Ch 26:29, + ´[[ז]]: et ´[[שׁׂפ]]: Jos 8:33 (R:D), and ( + [[רָאשִׁים]]) Jos 23:2 (R:D), Jos 24:1 (E, or R:D); ´[[שׁׂט]]: as minor judges also De 1:15; [[הַמְשָֽׁרְתִים אֶת־הַמֶּלֶח]] ´[[שׁׂט]]: 1Ch 27:1, chosen from Levites 2Ch 19:11, 2Ch 34:13 (+ [[סוֹפְרִים]], [[שׁוֹעֲרִים]]); as title of individ. 2Ch 26:11 (‖[[הַסּוֹפֵר ]]); of ant, [[אֵין־לָהּ קָחִין שׁׂטֵר וּמשֵׁל]] Pr 6:7.
